videos.name: ISKCON
videos.review: This app is perfect for all uses, being the best app for WhatsApp. It virtually has all features anybody would want.

videos.name: Bada Business Pvt. Ltd.
videos.review: This is the perfect all in one whatsapp marketing tool you can get anywhere, its exactly what I have been looking for.

videos.name: Udaan
videos.review: Kudos to developers and team. Great app, I am using since a year, very usefull for me.

videos.name: DearBHappy
videos.review: Finally an app that works, an all in one app, look no further, this is the real deal. Ticks all the boxes for what I want.
